page.title: 03GIRLS BRIGADE
page.content: For the village gala on June 29th the Girls Brigade are going on a float.We have to go as liquorice allsorts.My mum is making my costume.I am going as a square one.We are making ours out of cardboard boxes.My mum is painting my box black,white,black,white.I got the boxes from the church garage.I have a cushion with liquorice allsorts on.My brother drew some liquorice allsorts and coloured them in.He drew them for the side of the lorry.There will be about 27 girls.I just hope that it won't rain,because it rained and rained last year!
